description: BLEU metric with bonus for DuReader contest.

params.name: n_size
params.description: Number of gram for BLEU metric. Defaults to 4.

params.name: alpha
params.description: Weight of YesNo dataset when adding bonus for DuReader contest. Defaults to 1.0.

params.name: beta
params.description: Weight of Entity dataset when adding bonus for DuReader contest. Defaults to 1.0.
